code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../apis";export var postArticle=function postArticle(article,tags,token){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/articles"),{article:{title:article===null||article===void 0?void 0:article.title,description:article===null||article===void 0?void 0:article.description,body:article===null||article===void 0?void 0:article.content,tagList:tags}},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var getArticleBySlug=function getArticleBySlug(slug){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});};export var putArticle=function putArticle(article,tags,token,slug){return axios.put("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug),{article:{title:article===null||article===void 0?void 0:article.title,description:article===null||article===void 0?void 0:article.description,body:article===null||article===void 0?void 0:article.content,tagList:tags}},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
